column2:
"No, really, bravo! No complaints here.
After all, as powerful as you are, you should be able to complete this request."

"I'm glad I could once again
accurately confirm your true ability.
Oh, yes."

"After this, I want you to keep
demonstrating your strength for
the peace and security of ARKS."

"More than anything, that's because
I want to be at ease."
